version_description: Bug fixes and improvements.

Up Next
See, reorder and delete the upcoming songs.

Instant Playlist
Be a DJ and queue what's next using the Add buttons.

Polished design
The new Doppi is an even nicer home for your music.

Like the update? Take a sec to writ

This version contains bug fixes and improvements. From 2.1:

• Dark theme
Browse your music with gorgeous dark backgrounds.

• Pick a color
Choose one of the 6 highlight colors and make Doppi yours.

• Preferences
Configure it a

This version brings a completely redesigned Player. Tap the miniplayer bar at the bottom or drag it up to reveal the brand new Player.

The Library has also been refined, with consistent and cleaner typography, plus larger Add and Play buttons.
<

This version puts your History in a separate tab within Up Next, making it easier than ever to close Up Next by dragging it down (and to browse your History).

Also included: many bug fixes and improvements. Read all about them below:

• Album

New in this version:
- Added song progress indicator to MiniPlayer
- Added a Play/Pause button to the Up Next title bar
- Added Add buttons to History songs, so you can play them again and again
- Added 3D Touch to artist page albums
- Full

Search from anywhere
Pull down from anywhere in your library to bring up the brand-new Search interface.

Fully refreshed design
Every corner of Doppi has been reimagined for clarity and consistency.

Re-engineered library
Truly a bra

2.3.1:
• Fixed a crash during the import process, plus other related improvements under the hood

2.3:
Search from anywhere
Pull down from anywhere in your library to bring up the brand-new Search interface.

Fully refreshed design

This version improves stability in the import and background library update processes, fixes bugs introduced by changes in iOS 11, and provides localized sorting for Korean and Japanese.

From 2.3:
Search from anywhere
Pull down from anywhere

Doppi is ready to look great on any new iPhone you might acquire in the future! *wink*

This version also fixes compatibility with tracks that don't have metadata and improves library import reliability.

This version:
• Restores gapless playback, which means albums that are meant to play seamlessly will now do
• Enables diacritic-insensitive search, which means you can now find your music without typing in any special characters
• Fixes and impro

This version fixes:
• Repeat One
• Deleting songs from Up Next
• Importing songs with an assigned artist but no album

Plus, there's fixes and improvements to library updating and other internal components.

Happy holidays! Give your

Doppi turns 3! Let's celebrate with:

• Faster launch times, especially for larger libraries
• Fully redesigned Player — easier to use, easier to reach
• High contrast themes, for pure white or pure black backgrounds

Plus many other fix

Doppi 2.4.1 brings:
• Fixes and improvements
• Support for iPhone XS Max
• Swipe from anywhere to go back (not just the edge)

Plus everything from 2.4:
• Faster launch times, especially for larger libraries
• Fully redesigned Player

Doppi 2.4.2 brings small fixes and improvements. You now can also swipe from anywhere to go back (not just the edge).

From 2.4:
• Faster launch times, especially for larger libraries
• Fully redesigned Player — easier to use, easier to reach<

Doppi 2.4.3 brings fixes and improvements here and there.

Did you know that your Doppi can have a pure black or pure white background? Just enable High Contrast Theme in Preferences.

Enjoy, and share Doppi with a friend who loves music too.

Doppi 2.4.4 fixes:
• some songs not appearing in an artist's list
• Up Next not showing anything after opening the app
• now playing indicator not showing up inside albums
and more!

2.4.4 broke Continue Album, 2.4.5 restores it. Also includes fixes for:
• some songs not appearing in an artist's list
• Up Next not showing anything after opening the app
• now playing indicator missing inside albums
and more!

Customize Your Library
Browse genres and composers, sort your albums, and rearrange the sections in your library from Preferences.

More Relevant Search
Find your music with far less typing.

Better Design
An even more refined interfa

Doppi 3.0.1:
• Enables Doppi to handle larger libraries. If your library has several thousand songs and you had trouble importing before, please try again.
• Introduces correct ordering for multi-disc albums.
• Fixes some visual issues.

In

Doppi 3.1 brings:

Likes!
Add your favorite tracks to the new 'Liked Songs' Smart Playlist by tapping the heart on the Player.

Nicer Player
Now with easier to reach controls and swiping up from anywhere to open Up Next.

Refreshed

Doppi 3.2 brings:

• Contextual Menus
Tap and hold on items in your library to reveal useful actions.

• …For Everyone
Contextual Menus in Doppi are built to support iOS 11 and up.

• Tighter Bolts
A healthy dose of fixes a

Doppi 3.2.1 is ready for the next iOS:

• Follow System Dark Mode
Doppi will now automatically switch themes whenever your phone does.

• Dark Search
Once you go dark, Search will follow. Plus, a refreshed Dark Gray theme.

• Nativ

Manage your music with Doppi 3.3:
• Hide From Library
No longer into some tracks? Long press on them and select Manage.

• Exclude From Shuffle All
Always skipping the same songs? Keep them away from your shuffle.

• Fixes and Improve

With Doppi 3.4:

• Find More on Search
Recently added and liked albums, plus your most played songs, will now appear when you open Search.

• More Accessible Menus
Find Menu buttons at the top of artist, album, and playlist screens.
<

This version brings fixes and improvements, including:
- Music should consistently start after tapping a Play or Shuffle button in the library
- Artwork is now processed while the app is in the background
Enjoy, and stay safe!

Import music without iTunes with Doppi 4. 

Receive files and folders via AirDrop, use share sheets to send them to Doppi from other apps, or import from the Files app.

Doppi 4 also brings many other smaller fixes and improvements.

Doppi 4.0.1 fixes issues related to deleting imported files, among others.

Doppi 4 lets you import music without iTunes. Receive files and folders via AirDrop, use share sheets to send them to Doppi from other apps, or import from the Files app.

Doppi 4.0.2:
— improves the user experience on home button devices, especially on 4-inch ones
— fixes an issue that could result in the loss of liked, skipped, and hidden song metadata. If you've been using the app for more than 2 weeks, update as s

Doppi 4.0.3:
— Adds a complete French localization. Merci, mentea!
— Includes fixes and improvements

Doppi 4 lets you import music without iTunes. Receive files and folders via AirDrop, use share sheets to send them to Doppi from other apps,

Doppi 4.0.4:
— Adds the Doppi Folder, a folder that shows up on your Files app under 'On My iPhone' (and through iTunes File Sharing) where you can add your music files and folders for Doppi to pick up the next time you launch it
— Includes smaller

Doppi 4.0.5:
— Adds the ability to disconnect from Apple Music, for a truly iTunes-free experience. Find it on Preferences.
— Improves efficiency when syncing with the Doppi Folder
— Brings fixes and improvements to make for an even more reliable

• Bold new player design with smooth gestures and animations
• Lyrics: find, paste and edit the lyrics on your songs
• Import folders from Files, plus more fixes and improvements

Enjoy the bold new player design, over a year in the making :)

Doppi 4.1.1 brings:
• Visual tweaks to album art in detail screens
• Fixes to some reported crashes — thanks for reporting!

Plus all the fun stuff from 4.1:
• Bold new player design with smooth gestures and animations
• Lyrics: find, pa

Hiya! It's Doppi 4.1.2 with:
• Icon selection! Tip the developer to choose from 7 colors with 4 gorgeous design variants each. That's 28 icon options!
• Support for artwork on FLAC files!
• Much improved artwork caching efficiency
• Many more
